channel.title: Some Sword Design
channel.description:
Ive been doing 3d art for a while, but I havnt really developed my skills much yet, but anyway, here is two final fantasy based (not replica's) swords.
Sword 1: [img]http://img76.imageshack.us/img76/8431/ffswordvw3.jpg[/img]
Sword 2: [img]http://img162.imageshack.us/img162/9650/ffsword1xd1.jpg[/img]
Sword 1 & 2 Connected: [img]http://img105.imageshack.us/img105/3712/ffsword2sq2.jpg[/img]
Sword 1 & 2 Next to each other: [img]http://img162.imageshack.us/img162/3208/ffsword3ht0.jpg[/img]
Around 2 hours work, lol, could hae easily made into about 30 minutes.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 09, 2006, 07:50:48 AM[/size][hr]Dont mind selling this model for a few pounds or so.

item.title: Some Sword Design
item.dc:creator: @Uxalis Uxalis
item.description:
@Uxalis wrote:

casey:

pretty sweet did you use some 3D modeling program like blender or c4d to do those?

Cinema 4D r9.6 XL, and I’m currenly doing a textured version… im doing the first test render now…
